body.name: Seat Cushion, Lumbar Support Pillow with Adjustable Strap-Chair Cushions for Sciatica Pain Relief-with Washable Cover Memory Foam for Car, Travel and Wheelchair-Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 19 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Comfortable Sitting】The dimensions of the chair cushion are 18.1" x 14.2" x 3.2" and the dimensions of the lumbar support pillow are 13”x 4”x 13”. The size meets the needs of most people, and the shape of the product is ergonomically designed to effectively relieve the discomfort caused by sitting in one place for extended periods of time.

【Thoughtful Detailing】Our seat cushions and lumbar support pillows are made of durable fabric with quality zippers. The bottom of the seat cushion has a special non-slip design and the back of the lumbar support pillow is installed with adjustable straps to fit chairs of various sizes.

【Convenient to Use】The cover of the seat cushion and lumbar support pillow is removable and made of machine washable fabric for easy cleaning. The carrying handle on the seat cushion makes it easy to carry.

【High-quality Materials】The core of the seat cushion and lumbar support pillow is made of high-quality foam, which is both soft and supportive and not easily dented. Soft memory foam gently conforms to your body.

【Suitable for Work and Home】Great gift for anyone who sits for long periods of time. This product can be used at home, as an office chair cushion, or as car seat cushion, and also for people who often sit in wheelchairs OUTJOY.

reviews.reviewText: Seating very comfortable, outstanding back support. Would definitely repurchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I sit for hours in an office chair at home editing photos. This set of cushions have really help me-great support for my back and my behind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits great on my office chair.
reviews.reviewText: The cover comes off and is washable. The quality is good. The back support is nice, the bottom cushion doesn’t always stay in place, and it is not as supportive as I’d hoped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CushZone: My Travel Buddy. Continuously Supporting My Legs and Back Until Now.
reviews.reviewText: We planned to travel from one state to another on a road trip. That’s almost 24 hours. Although our vehicle has a lumbar support, I still have leg and back pains after a long drive.Before we hit on a long trip, I found this product on Amazon. It is a set consisting of (1) buttocks support and (2) back support (that’s how I described them lol).They are made of thick memory foam. Almost like 2-3 inches thick. It is so firm that even if you put 20 pounds of weight in it, it will stay in its shape. Its case is made of soft spandex that you can remove just by unzipping it and you can wash it anytime.I love how the structure of the buttocks support fits the way you sit and extends to your thighs. It gives you that airflow no matter how long you are sitting.The back support also has a soft case that you can unzip and wash. It has two adjustable straps that you can wrap around and buckle to your driver's seat.The only problem with the back support is when you buckle it, it won’t lie firmly from your seat.To get the most out of this set, I move the butt support a little forward before I sit, then place the back support (unbuckled) at the center of the backrest as I lean back. But, most of the time, I do not use the backrest foam support.I can tell you...After that long drive, I only felt 1% of the pain. I can drive the whole day with this set.If you’re at the age where you feel that pain in your legs and back while you drive... then this set is a must!It is one of the best investments that you can have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really elevates you
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable but it is so thick that my wife was sitting to high in her wheelchair. Made transport Very unstable. The back support did work well. This is more suitable for an office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this product at work. The chairs are extremely uncomfortable, especially for someone with a bad lower back and sciatica. This product is very helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy and durable
reviews.reviewText: I have used this for a month and have zero issues or discomfort from it. Great for the money and definitely recommended to others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: I have tried a different type and brands of these cushions and didn't help with my tailbone or lower back pain, but this seat cushion really helps, the space that has for the tailbone area is the best, and the back rest helps to keep your back in a good position and relaxed.
